welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sanxi, China! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's traditional charm, rich history, and delicious cuisine. Explore and enjoy all that Sanxi has to offer!

restaurants.name: Italy Square
restaurants.description: Italy Square is a pizzeria located in the city.

restaurants.name: McDonald's (麦当劳)
restaurants.description: McDonald's (麦当劳) is a fast food restaurant located in 石岐街道.
restaurants.address: Guangzhou Highway (Chengye Road), 石岐街道, 广东, 528400

restaurants.name: 煲煲掂
restaurants.description: 煲煲掂 is a chinese restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: 石岐佬中山菜馆
restaurants.description: 石岐佬中山菜馆 is a cantonese restaurant located in 石岐街道.
